description: An easy well-maintained trail in Belcarra Park and along Marine Drive in Belcarra then looping up on part of the Jug Island Trail (can continue at sign on rest of trail) or return to Belcarra Park on roadway.  Lots of Very Tall trees on this route, Woodhaven Swamp, Sasamat Lake and Belcarra's ocean front.  More trails link to this one if you want to extend the trip.
directions: Trail begins at Belcarra Park parking lot.  Head south towards the Springboard Trail and follow the route.
title: Woodhaven and Jug Island
